verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Verse: 1
Open my eyes and see
The wonderful mystery of your love
I am falling unto you
I am drawn to the gravity of your love

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Pre Chorus:
We are standing still
In a moment of eternity
When worlds collide
And I feel the breath of heaven over me

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Chorus:
My soul sings my soul sings
My soul sings how I love you
My soul sings my soul sings
My soul sings how I love you

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Verse: 2
Open the page and see
The wonderful history of your love
I start and end with you
I am pulled to the gravity of your love.
